questions.question: Who made you?
questions.answer: God.

questions.question: What else did God make?
questions.answer: God made all things.

questions.question: Why did God make you and all things?
questions.answer: For his own glory.

questions.question: How can you glorify God?
questions.answer: By loving him and doing what he commands.

questions.question: Why are you to glorify God?
questions.answer: Because he made me and takes care of me.

questions.question: Is there more than one true God?
questions.answer: No. There is only one true God.

questions.question: In how many Persons does this one God exist?
questions.answer: In three Persons.

questions.question: Name these three Persons.
questions.answer: The Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit.

questions.question: What is God?
questions.answer: God is a Spirit and does not have a body like men.

questions.question: Where is God?
questions.answer: God is everywhere.

questions.question: Can you see God?
questions.answer: No. I cannot see God, but he always sees me.

questions.question: Does God know all things?
questions.answer: Yes. Nothing can be hidden from God.

questions.question: Can God do all things?
questions.answer: Yes. God can do all his holy will.

questions.question: Where do you learn how to love and obey God?
questions.answer: In the Bible alone.

questions.question: Who wrote the Bible?
questions.answer: Chosen men who were inspired by the Holy Spirit.

questions.question: Who were our first parents?
questions.answer: Adam and Eve.

questions.question: How did God create man?
questions.answer: God created man, male and female, after his own image.

questions.question: Of what were our first parents made?
questions.answer: God made Adam's body out of the ground and Eve's body out of a rib from Adam.

questions.question: What else did God give Adam and Eve besides bodies?
questions.answer: He gave them souls that will last forever.

questions.question: Do you have a soul as well as a body?
questions.answer: Yes. And my soul is going to last forever.

questions.question: How do you know your soul will last forever?
questions.answer: Because the Bible tells me so.

questions.question: In what condition did God make Adam and Eve?
questions.answer: He made them holy and happy.

questions.question: What covenant did God make with Adam?
questions.answer: The covenant of life.

questions.question: What is a covenant?
questions.answer: A relationship that God establishes with us and guarantees by his word.

questions.question: In the covenant of life, what did God require Adam to do?
questions.answer: To obey God perfectly.

questions.question: Did Adam obey God perfectly?
questions.answer: No. Adam sinned against God.

questions.question: What is sin?
questions.answer: Sin is disobeying or not conforming to God's law in any way.

questions.question: What happened to Adam and Eve when they sinned?
questions.answer: They became guilty and subject to God's judgment.

questions.question: What effect did the sin of Adam have on all mankind?
questions.answer: All mankind is born in a state of sin and misery.

questions.question: What is misery?
questions.answer: Misery is a condition of suffering and unhappiness.

questions.question: Can anyone go to heaven with this sinful nature?
questions.answer: No. Our hearts must be changed before we can enjoy heaven.

questions.question: What is a change of heart called?
questions.answer: Regeneration or being born again.

questions.question: Who can change a sinner's heart?
questions.answer: Only the Holy Spirit.

questions.question: Can anyone be saved through the covenant of life?
questions.answer: No. No one can be saved by the covenant of life.

questions.question: Why can't anyone be saved through the covenant of life?
questions.answer: Because all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God.

questions.question: How did God reveal the covenant of grace?
questions.answer: Through the promise of a Savior.

questions.question: Who is the Savior?
questions.answer: The Savior is Jesus Christ.

questions.question: How did Jesus Christ fulfill the covenant of grace?
questions.answer: He obeyed the law of God perfectly and suffered the punishment for sin on behalf of his people.

questions.question: What is faith in Jesus Christ?
questions.answer: Faith in Jesus Christ is trusting in him alone for salvation.

questions.question: Can you repent and believe in Jesus Christ by your own power?
questions.answer: No. I can do nothing good without the help of the Holy Spirit.

questions.question: How can you get the help of the Holy Spirit?
questions.answer: God has told us to pray for the Holy Spirit's help.

questions.question: What is prayer?
questions.answer: Prayer is asking God for things he has promised to give.

questions.question: In whose name should we pray?
questions.answer: We should pray in the name of Jesus.

questions.question: What did God promise to give us in prayer?
questions.answer: God promises to hear us and to give us what is good for us.

questions.question: How do we know that God will hear our prayers?
questions.answer: Because the Bible tells us so.
